---
title: "Lake Superior Creel Schedule"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r input, echo=FALSE}
## User Inputs
YEAR <- 2019
LAKE <- "Superior"
ROUTE <- c("Corny-PW")
SEED <- 34583489
```

## Information
* Year: `r YEAR`
* Lake: `r LAKE`
* Route: `r ROUTE`
* Seed: `r formatC(SEED,format="d")`
* Ran: `r format(lubridate::now(),format="%d-%b-%Y at %H:%M")`

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
fldr <- ""
source(paste0(fldr,"Schedule_Helpers.R"))

## Read in Route and Shift information
f <- paste0(fldr,"Schedule_Info_LS.xlsx")
print(f)
LSroutes <- readRoutes(f,sheet="Routes") %>%
  dplyr::filter(route %in% ROUTE)
LSshifts <- readShifts(f,sheet="Shifts") %>%
  dplyr::filter(route %in% ROUTE)

## Set the random number seed
set.seed(SEED)
```

```{r makeSchedule, include=FALSE}
## Make the schedule
fn <- makeSchedule(YEAR,LAKE,ROUTE,LSroutes)
```
